citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Mexico Water Bodies, 2008

serinfo.issue: 2008 World, Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico

descript.abstract:
Mexico Water Bodies is a polygon theme representing the major lakes, reservoirs, and lagoons in Mexico. Attribute information includes the name, type, status, rank and area of the water body.
This dataset is a part of the 2008 ESRI Data & Maps collection.
descript.purpose: Mexico Water Bodies provides a base map layer of major lakes, reservoirs, and lagoons within Mexico.
descript.supplinf: Largest scale when displaying the data: 1:200,000.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States: Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local ESRI Regional Office. For support, you may contact ESRI Support Center by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com/; ESRI holidays excluded.
Outside the United States Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contact/.
For other questions or comments, you may contact ESRI headquarters by e-mail, telephone, or fax or write to us.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

dataqual.logic: The shapefile is converted to SDC (Smart Data Compression) format using either ESRI SDC Data Development Kit Professional 2 (DDKP2) or tools in ArcGIS. The SDC data set is then loaded into ArcSDE to verify and validate the geometry.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy is not known.

citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Proyecto Mxico Informacin Cartogrfica Digital

pubinfo.publish: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by ESRI: Downloaded the data set from the Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V. FTP site. Added the islands to the lakes along the northeastern coast by intersecting the lakes with Mexico States. Added attributes NAME, TYPE, and STATUS. Translated the Spanish values in the source OBJETO attribute to English and put them into the TYPE and STATUS attributes. Populated the NAME attribute with the title case version of the values of the source NOMBRE attribute and changed "SIN NOMBRE" to blank. Corrected a few miscoded values. Added the SQKM attribute and calculated its values. Created the RANK attribute and coded its values based on area. Converted the data set to SDC. Created ArcGIS layer file (.lyr), projection file (.prj), and spatial indices.

enttyp.enttypd: The polygons represent the major lakes, reservoirs, and lagoons in Mexico.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The area of the water body in square kilometers.
The rank of the water body based on its area.

edom.edomvd: The feature is at least 500 square kilometers in area.
The feature is between 100 and 499.99 square kilometers in area.
The feature is between 50 and 99.99 square kilometers in area.
The feature is between 25 and 49.99 square kilometers in area.
The feature is less than 25 square kilometers in area.
